summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 2020 discussing updates on the Ghislaine Maxwell case, including her transfer to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn and an upcoming bail hearing. The emails show coordination between FBI New York and FBI Headquarters regarding case developments and potential new victims.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the FBI emails discussing her transfer to detention, bail hearing, and potential new victims.

events.title: Maxwell transferred to MDC Brooklyn
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn.

events.title: Potential bail hearing (initially scheduled)
events.description: Maxwell was expected to have a bail hearing on Friday, July 10, 2020, but it could be moved to the following week.

events.title: Bail hearing rescheduled
events.description: The bail hearing was expected to occur on Tuesday, July 14, 2020, after being moved from the initially scheduled Friday date.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn on July 6, 2020.
A bail hearing was initially scheduled for Friday, July 10, 2020, but was expected to be moved to the following week, specifically Tuesday, July 14, 2020.
FBI personnel from New York and Headquarters were coordinating and inquiring about whether any new victims had come forward in the case.
The email chain shows internal FBI communication regarding case updates and operational coordination.
